des:
LITEdge is compatible with Alexa voice control system to take your smart home experience to a whole new level. You can operate the connected device through voice command, achieving a hands-free operation. Enjoy a more convenient daily routine and spend more time on things you love; simply say what you need and LITEdge will get the job done. 

After connecting Alexa to your LITEdge products in a few simple steps:
1.Download “LITEdge” App and register an account
2.Configure some devices on “LITEdge” App
3.Download Amazon "Alexa" app and configure Echo with "Alexa" app
4.Search "LITEdge - Torchstar Skill" skill from the "Alexa" app skills category
5.Click Enable skill,and you will be navigated to login page
6.Input your “LITEdge” App Account username and password, you'll be redirect to the success page
7.Now all setup is finished.

Examples of voice command you can give to LITEdge:

Connected applications:
*Alexa, turn on my living room light
*Alexa, turn off my living room light
*Alexa, turn on coffeemaker
*Alexa, turn on the speaker
 
Smart plugs:
*Alexa, turn on my plug
*Alexa, turn off my plug
